long_description: Six Salmon &* Steelhead FishSeeUV Lures in 4 sizes in a reusable small tackle box. Panther Martin Salmon & Steelhead FishSeeUV lures are incredibly effective on a wide variety of species, large trout, pike, pickerel, muskie and many others. FishSeeUV lures use bright orange, yellow, red, pink and green fluorescent UV treated colors, to make these new lures irresistible to the large salmon and steelhead. These lures also include a split ring and single siwash hook.  A great choice for use in both clear and murky waters!
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
